doc.title: An Affair of Honor
doc.plot: "A reproduction in motion of the famous picture of this name. A duel with rapiers between two women who are rivals in love. The contestants with their seconds are seen going to the meeting place, where they partially disrobe for the fray. The duel ensues, and one of the combatants falls mortally wounded, much to the consternation and regret of her antagonist."
